theoretical_significance: The number of generations is not a free parameter but a topological invariant of the G₂ manifold. The saturation condition N_gen × 8 = b₃ means all 24 harmonic 3-forms are occupied by fermion wavefunctions, explaining why we have neither 2 nor 4 generations. This is a parameter-free, purely geometric prediction that matches Nature exactly.
